fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - YTD Revenue by Month
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to calculate year-to-date revenue broken down by month with appropriate visualization. Tests date filtering and financial aggregation.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me our total revenue for this year, broken down by month in a bar chart. When I click on a month, I want to see the invoices for that month.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes revenue totals for each month of the current year
A bar chart or similar visualization is provided
Revenue values are reasonable and properly formatted with currency
Only current year data is included
Chart supports drill-down to show invoice details for selected month
Invoice table allows opening individual invoice records
